ARABIC: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That will be the True Day. So whoever wills should take the way back to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That day is certain. So whosoever likes may prepare a way to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: That Day is sure to come. So let him who will seek a resort with his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: That will be the Day of the Truth. So let those who want seek refuge from their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: That is the True Day; therefore whoever wills may take the path towards his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That is the True Day. So, whosoever wills, let him seek a place with His Lord!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That is the sure day, so whoever desires may take refuge with his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: That is the true day; so whosoever wills takes unto his Lord a resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That is the True Day. So whoso will should seek recourse unto his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: That Day is sure to come, so whoever wishes to, let him take the path that leads towards his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That is the Sure Day. Whosoever therefore willeth, let him betake Unto his Lord a resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That day is true for certain. So let anyone who wishes take resort with his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That Day will be the sure Reality: Therefore, whoso will, let him take a (straight) return to his Lord!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That is without doubt the True Day, so, whosoever wills, let him seek a place with (or a way to) His Lord (by obeying Him in this worldly life)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: That is the Day, the truth, so whosoever wills takes a way to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That is the Day of Reality. So whoever wills, let him take a way back to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:39] That is the True Day, whose coming to pass is definite, namely, the Day of Resurrection. So whoever wishes [to], let him seek resort with his Lord, a return [to Him], that is to say, [let him] return to God by being obedient to Him, so that he may be secure from chastisement in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That is the True Day) in which will happen what I have mentioned. (So whoso will should seek recourse) whoever will believe in Allah's divine Oneness and seek through his belief in Allah's divine Oneness a way of return (unto his Lord.
